name: Waiting For You
content: 金色的舞鞋 伴着音乐
Baby 你的眼睛是一弯深邃的湖水
Waiting for you kiss me at the night
留给我一望无际的思念
Waiting for you come here to my dream
一直到黑发变成了银线
Waiting for you waiting for you
Waiting for you kiss me at the night
留给我一望无际的思念 哦
Waiting for you waiting for you
Waiting for you kiss me at the night
留给我一望无际的思念
Waiting for you come here to my dream
一直到黑发变成了银线
Waiting for you waiting for you
